words.meaning: /ə'trækt/ v. to direct to the attention of
/ə'vɔid/ v. to prevent something bad from happening
/demənstreit/ v. to show something clearly by giving proof or evidence
/di'veləp/ v. to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced
/i'væljueit/ v. to form an opinion of amount, value or quality of something
words.vietnamese: đánh giá, định giá; ước lượng

words.meaning: /gæðə/ v. to come together, or bring people together
words.vietnamese: tập hợp, tụ tập, thu thập

words.meaning: /ɔfə/ v. to say that you are willing to do something for somebody

words.vietnamese: trước hết, đầu tiên, chính, chủ yếu

words.meaning: /rɪsk/ n. the possibility of something bad happening at some time in the future
/ˈstrætədʒi/ n. a plan that is intended to achieve a particular purpose
/strɔɳ/ adj. having a lot of physical power
/sʌbsti'tju:ʃn/ n. to take the place of somebody / something else
